H-Pineapple

So many National Days, We watch a deer traverse the world of GTA, Best boat name ever, Crushing stuff is the new fad, Poop Emoji Peeps - ‘Nuff said, 2 Stupid Games, and more.

This episode of Morning Show is sponsored by:

Links and Show Notes

Flownotes are carefully crafted, each morning, by artisan link-chefs and shared using Workflowy - Organize your brain.

Catch us on twitter and Facebook and get notified when new episodes are posted.

Listen to other great shows on the Goodstuff Broadcasting Network!

This show is produced by Kenny Roderick and Kyle Roderick. It originally aired Tuesday, March 22, 2016 at 9PM Pacific.
